issue.title: gplinks.co
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://gplinks.co/iQZXFEy](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgplinks.co%2FiQZXFEy)
### Comment
> It seems that the mechanism requires clicking the ad and waiting for 15 seconds to verify, as stated in "Click ad and wait for 15 seconds on ad to Verify." However, the ads are delivered by Google, and they disappear not only through DNS blocking but also with the AdGuard app on iOS. Therefore, it is impossible to bypass this system, which is a drawback of AdGuard. I understand that addressing issues through DNS is challenging, but is there any way to make it functional with AdGuard for iOS?
> 
> Thank you for your help.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jol51rr15ugccos0w8k80o0swcco8o8lt977o3cyr4.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2o08l1g80qo0g8ksgossks8o0o8g0w8ltd4zlrbybk.jpg?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `iOS 18.5`
Browser: | Safari

issue.title: sintra.ai

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://sintra.ai](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fsintra.ai) ### Comment > Missed analytics/tracker > > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher/events` > `alia-cloudflare.com/user/events` > > Suggested to clear tracking parameters, I have tested and it doesn't break original popup > > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=url` > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=is_mobile` > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=timezone` > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=ip_address` > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=user_agent` > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=new_session` > > `alia-cloudflare.com/launcher^$removeparam=path` - breaks popup, do not add ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ig0yg4dxglk4ccwckgsck0scc4cgko42a2p9qndbou.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Tracking Protection Custom filters: | `uBO default filters`

issue.title: jobkorea.co.kr
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.20.3

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.jobkorea.co.kr/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

`https://www.jobkorea.co.kr/Net/AdBannerApi/AdBannerLog`
`https://www.jobkorea.co.kr/NET/Scripts/AdBanner/AdBanner.js`
`https://www.jobkorea.co.kr/NET/Scripts/JK_Cookie.js`
`https://i.jobkorea.kr/content/js/ua-parser.min-sv-202005061649.js`
`||jobkorea.co.kr^$cookie=/GTM/`
`||jobkorea.co.kr^$cookie=JK_USER_UUID`

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin v1.65.0 System version: | `Windows 10 22H2` Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Privacy:
